column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Jidori Chickens are not factory farmed
column2: nor are they raised to full size. This is done intentionally to keep the chicken wings small so when they are fried
column3: they are extra crispy without overcooking the meat. But as a fellow Texan
column4: I can understand how our chicken wings might appear paltry compared to what you might find elsewhere.
